revised_title: Spectral Analysis of the Laplace Tidal Wave Equation
tldr: This paper discusses the eigenvalue problem associated with the Laplace tidal wave equation, which is derived from a mathematical model of wave motion in a thin fluid layer on a rotating sphere. The author presents three well-posed boundary value problems and constructs self-adjoint differential operators to represent each problem. The paper also explores the effects of interior singularities and the change in sign of the leading coefficient on the distribution of eigenvalues.
